verses.text: And the word of Yahweh to Jonah son of Amittai, saying,
" Get up, go to Nineveh, the great city, and call out against it, because their evil has risen up before my face. "

But Jonah got up to run away to Tarshish from before the face of Yahweh. And he went down to Joppa and found a ship going to Tarshish. So he paid the fare and went down into it to go with them to Tarshish, away from before the face of Yahweh.

paragraphs.combinedText: And the word of Yahweh to Jonah son of Amittai, saying, " Get up, go to Nineveh, the great city, and call out against it, because their evil has risen up before my face. " But Jonah got up to run away to Tarshish from before the face of Yahweh. And he went down to Joppa and found a ship going to Tarshish. So he paid the fare and went down into it to go with them to Tarshish, away from before the face of Yahweh.

verses.text: And the word of Yahweh to Jonah son of Amittai, saying,
" Get up, go to Nineveh, the great city, and call out against it, because their evil has risen up before my face. "

But Jonah got up to run away to Tarshish from before the face of Yahweh. And he went down to Joppa and found a ship going to Tarshish. So he paid the fare and went down into it to go with them to Tarshish, away from before the face of Yahweh.
And Jonah prayed to Yahweh his God from the stomach of the fish,
and he said, " I called from my distress to Yahweh, and he answered me. From the belly of Sheol I cried out. You heard my voice.

paragraphs.combinedText: And Jonah prayed to Yahweh his God from the stomach of the fish, and he said, " I called from my distress to Yahweh, and he answered me. From the belly of Sheol I cried out. You heard my voice.

verses.text: And Jonah prayed to Yahweh his God from the stomach of the fish,
and he said, " I called from my distress to Yahweh, and he answered me. From the belly of Sheol I cried out. You heard my voice.
And the word of Yahweh to Jonah a second time, saying,
" Get up, go to Nineveh, the great city, and call out to it the message that I am speaking to you. "

paragraphs.combinedText: And the word of Yahweh to Jonah a second time, saying, " Get up, go to Nineveh, the great city, and call out to it the message that I am speaking to you. "

verses.text: And the word of Yahweh to Jonah a second time, saying,
" Get up, go to Nineveh, the great city, and call out to it the message that I am speaking to you. "
But it was to Jonah greatly displeasing, and he became angry to him.
And Yahweh said, " You had pity on the plant, for which you did not labor for it, and which you did not make grow, which came up in a night and perished in a night.

And should I not have pity on Nineveh, the great city, in which there are more than 120, 000 people who do not know the difference between their right hand and their left hand, and also many animals? "

paragraphs.combinedText: But it was to Jonah greatly displeasing, and he became angry to him. And Yahweh said, " You had pity on the plant, for which you did not labor for it, and which you did not make grow, which came up in a night and perished in a night. And should I not have pity on Nineveh, the great city, in which there are more than 120, 000 people who do not know the difference between their right hand and their left hand, and also many animals? "

verses.text: But it was to Jonah greatly displeasing, and he became angry to him.
And Yahweh said, " You had pity on the plant, for which you did not labor for it, and which you did not make grow, which came up in a night and perished in a night.

And should I not have pity on Nineveh, the great city, in which there are more than 120, 000 people who do not know the difference between their right hand and their left hand, and also many animals? "
